title: Lost my Azir Champion
body: I checked my champion pool today I noticed I completely lost my ownership of Azir. How is this possible?

replies.body: Account-specific issues, especially content inquiries, can be sensitive topics. I recommend reaching out to our account specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can investigate.
why do you even care? Azir has been lost since 6.14, you should'n bother trying to get him back, he has like 40% winrate.
